testcase.classname: Guest User Register new account Successfully
testcase.name: Guest User Sign Up New account
testcase.system-out: Given Guest User Navigate to Register Page..................................passed When User choose Gender "Female"............................................passed And user enter first name "Automation" and last name "Testing"..............passed And user enter Date of Birth "15"-"May"-"1990"..............................passed And user enter Email "Emma3@AutomationTest.com".............................passed And user enter password "P@ssword1".........................................passed And User Confirm password "P@ssword1".......................................passed And user click on Register Button...........................................passed Then Success Message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: User Login with valid Data
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to Login Page...........................................passed When user enter valid Email "Emma3@AutomationTest.com"......................passed And user enter valid Password "P@ssword1"...................................passed And user click on Login Button..............................................passed Then User Login Successfully................................................passed

testcase.name: User Login with invalid Data
testcase.system-out: Given User Navigate to Login Page...........................................passed When user enter invalid Email "invalid@AutomationTest.com"..................passed And user enter invalid Password "invalidPass"...............................passed And user click on Login Button..............................................passed Then User CanNot Login and Fail Message is displayed........................passed

testcase.classname: Guest user click on Slider to go to its product page
testcase.name: Guest user click on 1st slider

failure.message: Error: Slider 1 didn't navigate to expected URL (Nokia) expected [true] but found [false]

testcase.failure:
When guest user click on slider "1".........................................passed Then website go to Nokia page...............................................failed
